co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block

Class BlockWireBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.block.Block
      • co.uk.niadel.mpi.common.block.BlockWireBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMeasureTransferer, BlockDirectionsMod, net.minecraft.block.ITileEntityProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockRedstoneWireBase

    public class BlockWireBase
extends net.minecraft.block.Block
implements net.minecraft.block.ITileEntityProvider, IMeasureTransferer, BlockDirectionsMod
    Base for things like pipes from buildcraft or wires from Thermal Expansion. TODO: Make this not depend on Tile Entities.
    Author:
    Niadel
